translations: v．发泄，施加（通常指负面影响）：对某人或某物施加破坏、报复或其他负面影响。
· The storm wreaks havoc on the coastal village.
暴风雨给沿海村庄带来了严重破坏。

sentences.sentence: In other words, it wreaks havoc on our memory.
sentences.translation: 换句话说，它对我们的记忆力造成了严重的破坏。

sentences.sentence: Worshipping the sun wreaks havoc on skin. So does smoking.
sentences.translation: 过度晒太阳会毁掉好皮肤，吸烟也是如此。

sentences.sentence: To put it lightly, our meat habit wreaks havoc on the world we live in.
sentences.translation: 说得轻一点，我们的食肉习俗也给我们生活的世界带来了巨大的破坏。
